content.description: Turtle dome is left of the Bear mountain trailhead.  The climb is in the southernmost cleft facing east.  Traverse on the highest ledge past a few loose placements and a bolt.  Trend left still on some horizontal features and top out at chains around the corner.  Variation:  At the bolt, go strait up the rotten scary crack (5.6, C1 for me)   Scramble unroped to the top then up one or two moves on rotten crystalized sandstone to the dragon statue.
content.location: Walk up the Bear Mountain trail past the twin spires (Ursa Major).  When you have the tortoise head to your left head west, north of the huge wash. Go to the southernmost cleft to get to the base, a faint bolt can be seen about 30 feet out on the ledge.

content.description: Turtle-shaped dome on the ridge to the west of Ursa Minor Spire, across the amphitheatre through which the main trail travels.
